text: The 1995 Round Australia Trial, officially the Mobil 1 Trial was the thirteenth running of the Round Australia Trial. The rally took place between the 13th of June and the 2nd of July 1995. The event covered 18,500 kilometres around Australia. It was won by Ed Ordynski and Ross Runnalls, driving a Holden Commodore. ==Results== The winning Holden Commodore VR of Ed Ordynski and Ross Runnalls, pictured in 2012 {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left; font-size: 95%;" |- ! ! !
